title: Linux无法开启服务端，求助
author: 黄总
txt_content:
启动脚本是
#!/bin/sh 
java -Xms1024m -Xmx1024m -jar -XX:+AggressiveOpts -XX:+UseCompressedOops PaperSpigot-1.8.8-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-latest.jar nogui
已经安装了java-1.8.0-openjdk和java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel
服务端在win下bat启动正常(最后也有一点报错，不过不影响运行)
在Linux上sh login.sh后，启动失败

下面这一段是完整的报错
Loading libraries, please wait...
Failed to start the minecraft server
java.lang.NullPointerException

t-1.8.8-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-latest.jar:git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc]        at com.google.common.collect.Lists.reverse(Lists.java:759) ~[PaperSpigot-1.8.8-R0.
1-SNAPSHOT-latest.jar:git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc]        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.UserCache.b(UserCache.java:191) ~[PaperSpigot-1.8.
8-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-latest.jar:git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc]        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.UserCache.<init>(UserCache.java:70) ~[PaperSpigot-
1.8.8-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-latest.jar:git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc]        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.<init>(MinecraftServer.java:126) ~
[PaperSpigot-1.8.8-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-latest.jar:git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc]        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.DedicatedServer.<init>(DedicatedServer.java:43) ~[
PaperSpigot-1.8.8-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-latest.jar:git-PaperSpigot-f6fba00-9935adc]        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.main(MinecraftServer.java:980) [Pa

求大触帮帮忙啊~~~~~

 -Xms1024m -Xmx1024m  改为 -Xms2G -Xmx3G
